name: Alienware Invader Skin
description:
I made this vector artwork as homage to a stunning piece from the golden era of skeuomorphic design.

Intented to be used as a skin for Windows Media Player, the design was used alongside a custom Windows theme, from the same creator: The Skins Factory.

You can check an archive of their work here:
https://www.theskinsfactory.com/desktop-themes
